articles.description: Man Utd are out of the Champions League and finish bottom of their group, while Arsenal draw at PSV Eindhoven, plus all the latest football news.
articles.title: Reaction to Man Utd's exit from Europe

articles.description: Manchester United's Champions League campaign proves "they do not belong in this elite company", writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: How Man Utd's worst-ever Champions League campaign ended in 'shambles'

articles.description: England let a dominant position slip as they fall to a four-wicket defeat by West Indies in the opening game of the T20 series in Bridgetown.
articles.title: West Indies win first T20 after England collapse

articles.description: In a video message, Khawaja said he "respected" authorities' decision to bar his shoes bearing the words "all lives are equal".
articles.title: Usman Khawaja to 'fight' cricket authorities' decision on Gaza message

articles.description: Dame Laura Kenny says women struggle to get pregnant because of the athlete lifestyle.
articles.title: 'Women struggle to get pregnant because of athlete lifestyle'

articles.description: Nick Kyrgios says he is "tired" and does not want to play tennis any more as he continues his recovery from injury.
articles.title: Recovering Kyrgios 'tired' of playing tennis

articles.description: Draymond Green is ejected for the third time this season as the Golden State Warriors go down 119-116 at the Phoenix Suns.
articles.title: NBA: Draymond Green ejected as Golden State Warriors lose to Phoenix Suns

articles.description: Australia's Pat Cummins says he is a better captain after the ultimate test in the Ashes against England this summer.
articles.title: Cummins 'better captain' after Ashes 'ultimate test'

articles.description: Serie A-winning boss Stefano Pioli is in danger of losing his job at AC Milan as he struggles to recreate past glories.
articles.title: Title-winning Pioli in danger of losing Milan job

articles.description: A pay deal signed by Netball Australia and players in their domestic league marks a "historic day", says former Diamonds captain Kathryn Harby-Williams.
articles.title: 'Historic day' as Netball Australia pay dispute ends
